NotFound.errorDesc: | This page could not be found

Navigation.THEME_DESC: Preview the theme colors and typography
Navigation.PAGES_SR_DESC: Edit the Home page cards vi server ations

PagesFeed.dialog_title_delete: You are about to delete the "{ title }" file entry
PagesFeed.dialog_description: This must be a valid/existing public page, defined within the project. By adding it here it will be available as a card at the homepage.
PagesFeed.dialog_description_delete: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the "{ title }" entry (id "{ id }") and remove its data from our servers. Are you absolutely sure?
PagesFeed.dialog_toast_response_title: The server response with status { status } and data:
PagesFeed.form_pageTitleDescription: Enter the display title/name of the page.
PagesFeed.form_pageDescriptionDescription: Enter the description of the page.
PagesFeed.form_pageUri_description: This will be used in the URL. The values are defined in @/routes.tsx
PagesFeed.form_pageUri_searchNotFound: The searched URI could not be found.
PagesFeed.form_pageImage_description: Choice an image. It must exist on the system.
PagesFeed.form_pageImage_searchNotFound: The image could not be found.
PagesFeed.form_pageVisibility_description: The value depends on the page URI and it is also defined in @/routes.tsx
PagesFeed.formSchema_title: The page title must be at least 2 characters.
PagesFeed.formSchema_description: The description must be at least 20 characters.
PagesFeed.formSchema_uri: The Page URI must be at least 2 characters. It must start with latin lowercase letter and can contain numbers and dashes.
PagesFeed.formSchema_image: The allowed formats are: png, jpg, jpeg, svg, webp.

FilesFeed.dialog_title_delete: You are about to delete the file "{ filename }"
FilesFeed.dialog_description: The files uploaded here will be accessible site wide.
FilesFeed.dialog_description_delete: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the file entry "{ filename }" (id "{ id }") and remove its data from our servers. Are you absolutely sure?
FilesFeed.dialog_toast_response_title: The server response with status { status } and data:
FilesFeed.form_fileNameDescription: Enter the name of the file. Use numbers, latin alphabet, dashes and underscores.
FilesFeed.form_fileDescriptionDescription: Write a note where the file will be used. The field is optional.
FilesFeed.form_fileInputChoiceFile: Click to choice or drag and drop a file here
FilesFeed.form_fileInputDescription: The allowed formats are: png, jpg, jpeg, svg, webp, pdf, pptx, xlsx, docx.
FilesFeed.formSchema_name: The file name is required it can contain only latin alphanumeric characters, dots, dashes and underscores. Cannot start with a special character.
FilesFeed.formSchema_description: The description is optional, it should be a string.
FilesFeed.formSchema_file: The file is absolutely required. It cannot start with a special character or a number.

Contact.title: Let's build together!
Contact.toast_error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
Contact.toast_reCaptcha_selfError: Something went wrong with reCaptcha API. Please try again.
Contact.toast_reCaptcha_scoreError: Please verify that you are not a robot.
Contact.form_name_error: The name is required and must be at least 3 characters.
Contact.form_name_description: We won't share your full name with anyone.
Contact.form_email_description: We won't share your email with anyone.
Contact.form_message_description: Leave me a message. Ask me anything related to the fields described in the services and projects sections.
Contact.form_message_error: The message is required it must be at least 25 characters.

ContactEmail_Client.yourMessage: The following message of yours was successfully submitted:
ContactEmail_Client.thankYou: Thank you for reaching out to me. I will get back to you as soon as possible.

AboutCV_AddEntry.dialog_description: You are about to add a new entry of type { entryType }.

AboutCV_Form.schema_title: The entry title must be at least 6 characters.
AboutCV_Form.schema_description: The description must be at least 20 characters.
AboutCV_Form.title_description: Enter the display title/name of the entry.
AboutCV_Form.description_description: Enter the display description of the entry.
AboutCV_Form.country_description: Enter the country of the entry.
AboutCV_Form.city_description: Enter the city of the entry.
AboutCV_Form.type_description: Select the type of the entry.
AboutCV_Form.visibility_description: Probably some items could be a draft...
